content.headline: Palantir and Colorado-Wyoming Regional Innovation Engine (CO-WY Engine) Awarded Inaugural US National Science Foundation Regional Innovation Engines Grant to Support Climate Resiliency
content.summary: DENVER, April 15, 2024--Palantir Technologies Inc. (NYSE: PLTR) announced it is a member of the Colorado-Wyoming Regional Innovation Engine (CO-WY Engine)-led team, which recently received the US National Science Foundation (NSF) inaugural Regional Innovation Engines program grant. The prestigious award positions the CO-WY Engine, led by Innosphere Ventures, at the forefront of the nation's environmental and climate technology initiatives.

content.headline: March jobs report tops estimates, investors look to shake losses: Yahoo Finance Live
content.summary: Wall Street is digesting a better-than-expected March jobs report. The U.S. economy added 303,000 jobs in March, higher than the 213,000 expected by economists. The unemployment dropped to 3.8%, which is in line with expectations. The news comes after the major indices (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC) closed steeply in the red yesterday, with the Dow experiencing its worst session in over a year. The selling comes as oil (CL=F) remains on track for its second straight week of gains. Yahoo Finance trending tickers include Advanced Micro Devices (AMD), HubSpot (HUBS), and Palantir (PLTR). Key guests include: 8:30 a.m. ET - Brian Levitt, Invesco Global Market Strategist & Dana Peterson, The Conference Board Chief Economist 9:30 a.m. ET - Brent Thill, Jefferies Senior Analyst 9:45 a.m. ET - Julie Su, Acting U.S. Labor Secretary 10 a.m. ET - Andrew Hollenhorst, Citi chief U.S. Economist 10:30 a.m. ET - Harmit Singh, Levi Strauss & Co.
